response.original_title: ド田舎の夏はヤルことがなくて隣の農家の巨乳奥さんの誘惑に乗っかり毎日じっとり汗だく交尾
response.overview: Yuta will spend her summer vacation in the country. When I was sick of an old-fashioned life with no radio waves and no games, I saw the activities of a couple from a farmhouse next door. Yuta is looking at his wife's chest, which is shiny with sweat and changes shape as it is rubbed. I was so excited that I couldn't control my erected crotch. Aika slowly and gently seduces me with Yuta, whose young wife Aika feels indecently, is stuck in her head. A full-scale cuckold drama played by Aika Yumeno!
response.title: There's Nothing To Do In The Summer When You Live Out In The Country, So I Was Lured Into Temptation By the Big Tits Farm Wife Who Lived Next Door, And Now I'm Having Sweaty, Relentless Sex Every Day Aika Yumeno
